cast.overview: Ana is an ambitious intern dreaming of a career in the art world while trying to impress her demanding boss Claire. When she's upgraded to first class on a work trip, she meets handsome Will, and Ana pretends to be her boss– a white lie that sets off a glamorous chain of events, romance and opportunity, until her fib threatens to surface.
cast.title: Upgraded

details.biography: Chloe Wade is a British actress, writer and theatremaker.  Chloe trained at the International School of Screen Acting and Central School of Speech and Drama in London. Having worked in film, TV and theatre for over 10 years, Chloe is a versatile actor best known for playing Joanne Grantham in BBC's Doctors (2000) and the lead role of Emily Davis in the British independent film Honeycomb Lodge (2014).
details.name: Chloe Wade
